text: Jóhannes Eðvaldsson (3 September 1950 – 24 January 2021) was an Icelandic international football player. He won the Scottish league championship twice with Celtic F.C. and the Scottish Cup once. Eðvaldsson died on 24 January 2021, aged 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Reykjavík
title: Jóhannes Eðvaldsson
